data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Bradynobaenus (Hymenoptera: Bradynobaenidae) from Argentina, with a key to the females of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torréns, Javier, Roig-Alsina, Arturo (2009): Description of a new species of Bradynobaenus (Hymenoptera: Bradynobaenidae) from Argentina, with a key to the females of the genus. Zootaxa 2047: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186482
